data.actual_result: The gif is duplicated with one in the background paused and one moving
data.expected_result: Your gif should be playing normally (or be paused normally)
data.short_description: Propic gifs duplicate if it is partially transparent
data.steps_to_repro: - With a partially transparent gif as profile picture, send EXACTLY one message in any chat - Press up on your keyboard to edit the message - Put your mouse away from the message that you're editing
